review: This tray fit on my Honda Element steering wheel,  yeah! Would definitely recommend this tray! This is a great item if you do a lot of driving and eat in the car; I have a dog, so I don't go into restaurants. It's nice to have a "table" to eat at.  However, I would not set a drink on this as I would worry it would knock over. Besides, that's what cup holders are for anyway.
productTitle: Zone Tech Car Laptop and Food Steering Wheel Tray (Black)
